thread.title: 232 nabbed in Bicol anti-illegal gambling drive
thread.title_full: 232 nabbed in Bicol anti-illegal gambling drive

author: cbibe
title: 232 nabbed in Bicol anti-illegal gambling drive
text:
Inquirer Southern Luzon / 08:33   
LEGAZPI CITY â€” Police arrested 232 people in anti-illegal gambling operations in the Bicol Region from Feb. 3 to 18, said Senior Inspector Maria Luisa Calubaquib, Bicol police sokesperson, on Monday. 
In Albay, 11 operations rounded up 38 individuals and P6,434 in bet money. ADVERTISEMENT 
In Camarines Norte, 46 persons were held with bet money amounting to P3,226. 
In Camarines Sur, 69 were arrested and yielded P6,277 bet money. 
In Catanduanes, only 10 individuals were nabbed but yielded P19,431.50. 
In Masbate, 19 were arrested with P4,832 confiscated. 
In Naga City, 23 alleged gamblers were put behind bars with P6,270 bet money seized. 
In Sorsogon, police collaged 27 but only P1,371 bet money was seized. CBB
